action.name: Acquaintance with the eagle and taygans(Bokonbaevo)

days.name: DAY 1
days.title: Bishkek > Ala-Archa National Park > City tour 150km

action.name: In the morning we will meet you at the airport and take you to your hotel
At lunchtime, we will go to Ala-Archa and enjoy beautiful nature
After Ala-Archа there will be a city tour, Osh bazaar (Asian market), and Ala-Too square where we will see the changing of the guard of honor performed by the national guard.

days.name: DAY 2
days.title: Burana Tower > Konorchok canyons > Son-Kol lake 350km

action.name: In the morning we will drive to the Burana Tower, get acquainted with the Balbal stones and history
Later in the Boom Gorge, we will have hiking in the Konorchok / Kok-Moinok canyons
Let's stop at the panorama of the Orto-Tokoy reservoir, enjoy the views and take photos
In Kochkor, we can visit the craft shop of the Kochkor region
We will pass Kochkor and begin our ascent to the Son-Kol lake through the Kalmak-Ashuu pass
We spend the night in a yurt camp
Today we will descend from Son-Kolya along the Teskey-Torpok pass, which is famous for its serpentines
We will visit a gorgeous waterfall that flows from Son-Kol
Then we will drive through the territory of the Karatal Japyryk reserve along the Kara-Unkur gorge and the Dolon pass
We will drive again along the Orto-Tokoy reservoir, only this time along the southern side
If there is a chance, we will meet camels in the Kyzyl-Ompol area
If we keep up with the time, let's stop by the Ak-Sai canyons
In Bokonbaevo we will have a full-fledged program with Berkuts(Eagle) and Taigans (Kyrgyz greyhounds)
We will spend the night in a guest house in Bokonbaevo

days.name: DAY 4
days.title: Skazka canyons > Karakol city > Cholpon-Ata city 300km

action.name: Today we will start with a visit to the Skazka Canyon
If time and effort allow you to enter the Barskoon Gorge (as the Swiss say, second Switzerland)
We will visit the Jeti-Oguz panorama
In Karakol, we will visit the Dungan Mosque, Orthodox Church, antique and eco-product shops
Today we will visit a trout farm and eat delicious fish!
We will try to visit the Semyonovskoye and Grigorievskoye gorges, the Kyrchyn valley where the 1-2-3 World Nomad Games were held
Note: We should make a PCR test in Karakol city, results will be ready the next day and can be taken in Bishkek!!!!
In the morning we will swim in hot springs. If possible, we will try to do it in Karakol on the 4th Day
Then we will go to Chon-Kemin, ride horses, enjoy the nature of the Chon-Kemin natural park
After that, we will arrive in Bishkek and will have time to do those things that we could not do on the 1st day
Note: in Bishkek, we can make an urgent PCR test from 17: 00-21: 00 and receive the results at 02:00!!!!!!!
There are a lot of interesting places along the route and we can choose or delete this or that place at our discretion, based on time and effort
